content: स्तृ {vI.v} {c5c} <ab>U.</ab> (स्तृणोति, स्तृणुते, स्तृत; {%<ab>pass.</ab>%} स्तर्यते) {@--1@} To spread, strew, cover, spread on or over; (महीं) तस्तार सरघाव्याप्तैः स क्षौद्रपटलैरिव <ls>R. 4. 63</ls>, <ls n="R.">7. 58.</ls> {@--2@} To spread, expand, diffuse. {@--3@} To scatter, spread about. {@--4@} To clothe, cover, overspread, envelop. {@--5@} To kill. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (स्तारयति-ते) To overspread, cover, strew; रक्तेनाचिक्लिदद्भूमिं सैन्यैश्चातस्तरद्धतैः <ls>Bk. 15. 48.</ls> {%--<ab>Desid.</ab>%} (तिस्तीर्षतिते) {vII.v} {c5c} <ab>P.</ab> (स्तृणीते) To please, gratify.
